CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Mountain Peaks Park relative to Theme Parks?
SRP.A: Mountain Peaks Park is {below} Theme Parks in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Theme Parks relative to Mountain Peaks Park?
SRP.A: Theme Parks is {above} Mountain Peaks Park in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total tourist attraction visits?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Theme Parks}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total tourist attraction visits?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Mountain Peaks Park}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Mountain Peaks Park's maximum Tourist Attraction Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Mountain Peaks Park's maximum Tourist Attraction Visits is in {1977}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Theme Parks's maximum Tourist Attraction Visits in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Theme Parks's maximum Tourist Attraction Visits is in {2000}.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1989, did the total Tourist Attraction Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1979 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total tourist attraction visits between 1982 and 1989 was {smaller} than between 1979 and 2000.

NC.Q: Between 1983 and 2000, did the total Tourist Attraction Visits experience a larger or smaller change than between 1984 and 2000?
NC.A: The change in total tourist attraction visits between 1983 and 2000 was {larger} than between 1984 and 2000.

NC.Q: Was the total Tourist Attraction Visits in 1991 higher or lower than in 1994?
NC.A: The total tourist attraction visits in 1991 was {lower} than in 1994.

NC.Q: Was the total Tourist Attraction Visits in 1984 higher or lower than in 1998?
NC.A: The total tourist attraction visits in 1984 was {lower} than in 1998.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Theme Parks} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Theme Parks and Mountain Peaks Park first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Theme Parks and Mountain Peaks Park first exchanged leading positions in {1978}.
